SQLObject Community

SQLObject questions and discussion happens on the sqlobject-discuss mailing list. Gmane also has the list in gmane.comp.python.sqlobject accessible by HTTP, HTTP (blog format) and News.

Bugs should be submitted to the bug tracker at SourceForge or GitHub, and patches to the patch tracker (or send pull requests at GitHub).

Development takes place in the git repositories. There are development docs. If you are interested in contributing you should read the Developer Guide.

The Author List tries to list all the major contributors.

One can also contribute to community-editable recipe/documentation site.
